trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were no other sightings in Kingman on or around March 6th 2009
divs: sighting details my boyfriend, my mother, and myself were outside letting our new puppy go pee. i look up and there was this extremely bright light in the sky (not venus!) so i point it out to them. it was quite low and to the west. i went inside to grab the camcorder (sadly no tape; was using to zoom in). it was blurry, but looked very odd up close. when i looked back up, it disappeared, then reappeared slowly through the clouds. then came a little closer, zig zagged then completely went away. total time was about 10 minutes. this is the 3rd time this has happened over the past month each being in a different spot \ same time range. it is no plane, or anything like that as it hovers. others have seen it too, i know since i read some of the recent reports. i am receiving tapes for my video camera so i will send those in if this ever happens again. this really is an amazing sight.
Summary: 7:43 pm, very bright light in the sky.
